definitions.definition: A referee or adjudicator at a fight , wrestling match, duel , etc. who ensures fair play .
Someone who insistently advocates for something, especially for strict observance of a formal rule.
examples: Lexicographers are sticklers for correct language.

main_definition: ( now only Cornwall ) A referee or adjudicator at a fight , wrestling match, duel , etc. who ensures fair play . [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: Someone who insistently advocates for something, especially for strict observance of a formal rule. [from 17th c.]
